text_blocks.content: Re: Need you to reconstruct 292 data for Inmate Epstein, 76318-054 From [b(6); (b)(7)(C) To [b(6); (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/08/12 08:08 Subject: Re: Need you to reconstruct 292 data for Inmate Epstein, 76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm, Epstein [b(6); (b)(7)(C) 76318-054.pdf
The attached is the 292 history report (week of August 4th) for Epstein. Since I could not access to J3P1, I could not research his history records.

As you are probably aware inmate Epstein was found dead in his SHU cell in NYM this past Saturday morning. We need to reconstruct as best we can Inmate Epstein's 292 record for the week prior to his death (Monday, August 5, 2019 through Friday, August 9, 2019). Please make this your number one priority and e-mail me the results when you are done. This is a time critical task.

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain regarding reconstructing Inmate Epstein's 292 data. The email contains redactions of personal information.
